augment(bool,IController,address,address.notice: Destroy {consumed item} to augment given {item}. There is a chance of 30% that the item will be destroyed instead of augmentation.

reduceEquippedItemsDurability(IControlle.notice: Reduce durability of all equipped items except not-used items of SKILL-type. Used skills are stored in skillSlotsForDurabilityReduction

repairDurability(bool,IController,addres.notice: Destroy {consumed item} to repair durability of the {item} There is a chance ~ item fragility that the item won't be repaired.
